casebody.data:
BOARD OF PENSIONS OF EVANGELICAL LUTHERAN CHURCH IN AMERICA, dba Portico Benefit Services, petitioner,
v.
David BACON, et al. No. 16-910. Supreme Court of the United States Feb. 27, 2017.

Motion of Alliance Defending Freedom for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the Court of Appeals of Minnesota denied.
